item.title: Anthony Lester
item.description:
Anthony Lester

This is my scrapbook of all things that interest, amuse, fascinate and inspire me in the world of swimming, cycling and running. I could have done it on facebook but all my friends and family are probably sick to death of my constant witterings and ramblings.Â

item.title: Transition from pool to open water swimming
item.description:
Transition from pool to open water swimming

Written by Adam Walker Adam is a swim coach and motivational speaker who became the first British person to swim the hardest 7 ocean swims in the world. He teaches people swim stroke, psychology and all aspects in order to achieve their specific swimming goals. 1.

item.title: Energy drinks run out of fizz as scientists discover spoonful of sugar in water has same effect
item.description:
Energy drinks run out of fizz as scientists discover spoonful of sugar in water has same effect

However, researchers found that combining different sources of sugars improves the rate at which people can absorb them from the gut. In a new study, published in the American Journal of Physiology - Endocrinology & Metabolism, they assessed the impact of endurance exercise on liver glycogen levels.

item.title: A long running myth - Athletics Weekly
item.description:
A long running myth - Athletics Weekly

Running has a reputation as being bad for your joints and bad for your heart. Indeed, non-runners will tell you that it is an activity as beneficial to your knees as hitting them with a hammer and is more likely to cut your life short than enhance it.

item.title: 50 Milestone
item.description:
50 Milestone

6 year old Ollie reaches the 50 runs milestone with a 5km PB of 28:57

item.title: What's many times more deadly than terrorism? Britain's roads
item.description:
What's many times more deadly than terrorism? Britain's roads

Count the number of times you hear the chancellor and prime minister say "security", their watchword and their excuse for all they mean to do, from brutal spending cuts to purchasing an armoury of foreign military hardware. But fears are rarely rational.

item.title: No title
item.description: Training is banking, so we can withdraw when we need it most. It's a grind but when the time comes, we'll say - "Show me the money!"

item.title: Train Slower, Race Faster
item.description:
Train Slower, Race Faster

Most runners train too hard, too often. A couple years ago I went for a run with Adam and Kara Goucher around the Nike campus in Beaverton, Ore.

#adidas26rs

There's a new running club in town #adidas26rs

item.title: parkrun milestone T's
item.description:
parkrun milestone T's

parkrun celebrates peoples milestones by giving them free technical T-shirts from Tribe Sport. Juniors receive a T for 10 completed runs while adults must run 50/100/250/500. You can also get a very special volunteer T-shirt if you volunteer 25 times or more.
